Program Description (guideline): $50 rebate for Electric Resistance Water Heaters in new construction
$70 rebate for Electric Resistance Water Heaters replacing natural gas or propane water heaters or if a member signs up for Time-of-Use rate
Other Restrictions: Must be replacing propane or natural gas OR member must sign up for Time of Use rate.

Program Description (guideline): $950 rebate for Electric Heat Pump Water Heaters (not to exceed 50% of equipment cost)
$22 per kW rebate for controlled off peak heating (ETS) units controlled by timers or a master control system
Equipment Standards Restrictions: Minimum qualifying load for ETS is 1 kW.
Other Restrictions:
*Permanently installed units only.
*Rebates must be applied for within 90 days of installation to qualify.
*All items must be new

Program Description (guideline): $18 per kW rebate for heated floors controlled by timers or master control system
Other Restrictions:
*Permanently installed units only.
*Rebates must be applied for within 90 days of installation to qualify.
*All items must be new

Program Description (guideline): $1175 rebate for standard Air Source Heat Pumps that are at most 2 tons (not to exceed 50% of equipment cost)
Bonus Description: $100/unit additional incentive for central air source with integrated controlled Electric Thermal Storage (ETS) backup in lieu of a separate ETS incentive
Equipment Standards Restrictions:
(Standard ASHP)
Required HSPF >= 9.0 and SEER >= 15 or, HSPF2 >= 7.6 and SEER >= 14.3
Other Restrictions:
*Incentive amount is the lower of stated rebate or 50% of equipment cost
*Rebates must be applied for within 90 days of installation
*All items must be new

Program Description (guideline): $2300 rebate for standard Air Source Heat Pumps over 2 tons (not to exceed 50% of equipment cost)
Bonus Description: $100/unit additional incentive for central air source with integrated controlled Electric Thermal Storage (ETS) backup in lieu of a separate ETS incentive
Equipment Standards Restrictions:
(Standard ASHP)
Required HSPF >= 9.0 and SEER >= 15 or, HSPF2 >= 7.6 and SEER >= 14.3
Other Restrictions:
*Incentive amount is the lower of stated rebate or 50% of equipment cost
*Rebates must be applied for within 90 days of installation
*All items must be new

Program Description (guideline): $1500 rebate for Cold Climate Tier 2 Air Source Heat Pumps that are at most 2 tons (not to exceed 50% of equipment cost)
Bonus Description: $100/unit additional incentive for central air source with integrated controlled Electric Thermal Storage (ETS) backup in lieu of a separate ETS incentive
Equipment Standards Restrictions: (Cold-Climate ASHP) required HSPF > = 10.0 and SEER > = 16 or, HSPF2 >=8.5 and SEER >=15.2; variable speed compressor or a minimum of 3 stages (settings for fan speed)
Other Restrictions:
*Incentive amount is the lower of stated rebate or 50% of equipment cost
*Rebates must be applied for within 90 days of installation
*All items must be new

Program Description (guideline): $5400 rebate for Cold Climate Air Source Heat Pumps over 2 tons (not to exceed 50% of equipment cost)
Bonus Description: $100/unit additional incentive for central air source with integrated controlled Electric Thermal Storage (ETS) backup in lieu of a separate ETS incentive
Equipment Standards Restrictions: (Cold-Climate ASHP) required HSPF > = 10.0 and SEER > = 16 or, HSPF2 >=8.5 and SEER >=15.2; variable speed compressor or a minimum of 3 stages (settings for fan speed)
Other Restrictions:
*Incentive amount is the lower of stated rebate or 50% of equipment cost
*Rebates must be applied for within 90 days of installation
*All items must be new

Program Description (guideline): $450 rebate per ton for air-to-water units with EER at least 19 and COP at least 4
Bonus Description: $100/unit additional incentive for central air source with integrated controlled Electric Thermal Storage (ETS) backup in lieu of a separate ETS incentive
Other Restrictions:
*Rebates must be applied for within 90 days of installation
*All items must be new

Technology*: Ground Source Heat Pump (GSHP) / Geothermal HP
Program Description (guideline): $500 rebate per ton for new installations of Ground Source Heat Pumps
Bonus Description: Additional matching rebate of $500 per ton for new installations, up to $2500 per installation
Other Restrictions:
*New ground source heat pump systems are eligible
*Rebates must be applied for within 90 days of installation
*All items must be new

Technology*: Ground Source Heat Pump (GSHP) / Geothermal HP
Program Description (guideline): $250 rebate per ton for existing unit replacement of Ground Source Heat Pumps
Other Restrictions:
*New ground source heat pump systems are eligible
*Rebates must be applied for within 90 days of installation
*All items must be new

Program Description (guideline): $200 rebate per unit for Evaporative Coolers
Other Restrictions: Limit 2 per account. No window or portable units.
